channel.title: How to change minecraft server passwort
channel.description: hello iwont to change my minecraft passwort in the server but i dont now how i can do this thing can someone help me :( :confused:

item.title: How to change minecraft server passwort
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Click the button that says “PROFILE” on the blue bar near the top of the forums. When you do that look on the left side of your screen and look for a button that says “MODIFY PROFILE”, hover over that and then click “FORUM PROFILE” from the list that drops down. The very last box on that page is for your moparcraft server password. Delete whatever is in there if there is anything and type in the password you want to use. Then go below that a little and down to the bottom right there is a button that says “Change Profile” Click on that and you are done.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change minecraft server passwort
